full_address: 19 Etna Street, Isle Of Capri, Qld 4217
description:
Holding prime position within a prestigious Isle of Capri cul-de-sac, this immaculately presented house invites you to discover scenic hinterland views and a peaceful waterfront lifestyle.

Set atop a low-maintenance 615m2 block with 16.3m of water frontage, the single-level residence features a practical floor plan across which glossy marble floors bring a touch of elegance.

Designed with family living in mind, five spacious bedrooms provide sanctuary for rest and relaxation in their own wing, and include two large master suites with walk-in robes, private ensuites and outdoor access.

Glazing welcomes natural light into an open kitchen, living and dining space, where pillars and bespoke wallpaper draw the eye, while glass sliders facilitate refreshing breezes and flowing connection to a covered waterfront patio.

Lounge by the large swimming pool, or launch a kayak with ease for a leisurely paddle along Main River.

The Highlights:

- Renovated single-level house with water and hinterland views
- Low-maintenance 615m2 holding with 16.3m water frontage
- Positioned in a quiet Isle of Capri cul-de-sac just off Main River
- Covered entertaining area with water and hinterland outlook; covered patio; uncovered poolside area
- Large swimming pool with established gardens for privacy
- Open living, dining and kitchen space with water outlook
- Living and dining have glazing and sliding door access to covered entertaining area
- Galley kitchen has granite benchtops, Smeg oven, five-burner gas cooktop, double sink, butler's pantry, subway tile splashback, and black pendant lighting
- Two master suites have walk-in robes, outdoor access, and ensuites with floor-to-ceiling tiles; one has built-in bath and double vanity with marble benchtop
- Three additional bedrooms have built-in robes
- Main bathroom has built-in bath and separate toilet
- Laundry with sink and storage; external drying court
- Secure double carport plus coded pedestrian access
- Keyless Samsung entry system plus Bticino intercom
- Split-cycle air conditioning; solar power system

This prime waterfront address in the prestigious Surfers Paradise enclave of Isle of Capri offers proximity to Main River, beaches and key conveniences. The upscale shopping and dining precinct of Capri on Via Roma is a short cycle away, while Sorrento Shopping Village and Pacific Fair Shopping Centre can be reached in less than 10 minutes by car. The address lies in the catchment for Surfers Paradise State School and Benowa State High School, while The Southport School and St Hilda's School are also nearby.

Settle straight into a peaceful waterfront lifestyle – contact Sam Guo 0423 064 310 or Julia Kuo 0402 668 885.

Disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these particulars, no warranty is given by the vendor or the agent as to their accuracy. Interested parties should not rely on these particulars as representations of fact but must instead satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise.
